API Reference¶

Blob Bindings¶

class azure.functions.InputStream[source]¶

File-like object representing an input blob.

length¶

The size of the blob in bytes.

name¶

The name of the blob.

read(size=-1) → bytes[source]¶

Return and read up to size bytes.

Parameters:size (int) – The number of bytes to read. If the argument is omitted, None, or negative, data is read and returned until EOF is reached.
Returns:Bytes read from the input stream.
uri¶

The blob’s primary location URI.

HTTP Bindings¶

class azure.functions.HttpRequest[source]¶

HTTP request object.

get_body() → bytes[source]¶

Return request body as bytes.

get_json() → Any[source]¶

Decode and return request body as JSON.

Raises:ValueError – when the request does not contain valid JSON data.
headers¶

A dictionary containing request headers.

method¶

Request method.

params¶

A dictionary containing request GET parameters.

url¶

Request URL.

class azure.functions.HttpResponse(body=None, *, status_code=None, headers=None, mimetype=None, charset=None)[source]¶

An HTTP response object.

Parameters:
  • body (str/bytes) – Optional response body.
  • status_code (int) – Response status code. If not specified, defaults to 200.
  • headers (dict) – An optional mapping containing response HTTP headers.
  • mimetype (str) – An optional response MIME type. If not specified, defaults to 'text/plain'.
  • charset (str) – Response content text encoding. If not specified, defaults to 'utf-8'.
charset¶

Response text encoding.

get_body() → bytes[source]¶

Response body as a bytes object.

headers¶

A dictionary of response HTTP headers.

mimetype¶

Response MIME type.

status_code¶

Response status code.

Queue Bindings¶

class azure.functions.QueueMessage(*, id: Union[str, NoneType] = None, body: Union[str, bytes, NoneType] = None, pop_receipt: Union[str, NoneType] = None) → None[source]¶

A Queue message object.

Parameters:
  • id (str) – An optional string specifying the ID of the message.
  • body – A string or bytes instance specifying the message body.
  • pop_receipt (str) – An optional string containing the pop receipt token.
dequeue_count¶

The number of times this message has been dequeued.

expiration_time¶

A datetime object with the message expiry time.

get_body() → bytes[source]¶

Return message content as bytes.

get_json() → Any[source]¶

Decode and return message content as a JSON object.

Returns:Decoded JSON data.
Raises:ValueError – when the body of the message does not contain valid JSON data.
id¶

Message ID.

insertion_time¶

A datetime object with the message queue insertion time.

pop_receipt¶

The message pop receipt token as a string.

time_next_visible¶

A datetime object with the time the message will be visible next.

Timer Bindings¶

class azure.functions.TimerRequest[source]¶

Timer request object.

past_due¶

Whether the timer is past due.

CosmosDB Bindings¶

class azure.functions.Document(**kwargs)[source]¶

An Azure Document.

Document objects are UserDict subclasses and behave like dicts.

doc[field]

Return the field of doc with field name field.

doc[field] = value

Set field of doc with field name field to value.

classmethod from_dict(dct: dict) → azure.functions._cosmosdb.Document[source]¶

Create a Document from a dict object.

classmethod from_json(json_data: str) → azure.functions._cosmosdb.Document[source]¶

Create a Document from a JSON string.

to_json() → str[source]¶

Return the JSON representation of the document.

class azure.functions.DocumentList(initlist=None)[source]¶

A UserList subclass containing a list of Document objects

Function Context¶

class azure.functions.Context[source]¶

Function invocation context.

function_directory¶

Function directory.

function_name¶

Function name.

invocation_id¶

Function invocation ID.

Out Parameters¶

class azure.functions.Out[source]¶

An interface to set function output parameters.

get() → T[source]¶

Get the value of the output parameter.

set(val: T) → None[source]¶

Set the value of the output parameter.
